author: CrimZin
text:
Spent several hours researching the available talent, looking for an outcall provider. Wound up texting with.
Makayla.
http://charleston.backpage.com/Women...-pics/16714856
She has good reviews here and the other site. Asked if she would be available to visit me, she said she wouldn't be available until after 9. Texted sporadically through the day. About 830, she texts says it may be closer to 10. About 930 texts again to say "you're coming to see me right?" Texted her back that, no, I was requesting outcall. - Radio silence thereafter.
Tried Texting Nikki.
http://charleston.backpage.com/Women...e-now/16609439
Before that, with no response. Decided to call after the Makayla thing fell through. She picked up with really poor sound quality, was OK with outcall to my location, Quote: d. 24 for the HR, just needed proof that I wasn't LEO. Sent evidence to dispel any fear, then she texted me wanting me to get her Uber transport. Told her I didn't think so.
